content: The `Navbar` is a responsive navigation header. It is composed of `Navbar`, `NavbarBrand`, `NavbarContent`, `NavbarItem`, and components for a collapsible menu (`NavbarMenuToggle`, `NavbarMenu`, `NavbarMenuItem`).
The Navbar is `sticky` by default but can be set to `static`. The `shouldHideOnScroll` prop allows it to hide automatically when the user scrolls down.
The Navbar includes a collapsible menu for mobile devices, controlled by `NavbarMenuToggle`. Its state can be controlled with the `isMenuOpen` and `onMenuOpenChange` props.
A bottom border can be added with `isBordered`. The default blur effect can be disabled with `isBlurred={false}`. Active items can be styled using the `[data-active=true]` attribute.
